title: Marrakech Decorative Bowl
description:
The beauty and glamour of Morocco are captured in our royal green Marrakech large decorative bowl. Thick black lines recall patterned ceilings from an ancient palace still intriguing today, an heirloom of a different sort. Each piece is individually handmade of sand cast aluminum - which has been sculpted, polished, and finished with a proprietary blend of enamel mixed with crushed mother of pearl.  Hand wash only, not microwave safe.

  • Dimensions: 14 in.
